  • 백준 Silver1 - 최소 힙

    백준 1927번 풀이 import heapq n = int(input()) h = [] res = [] for _ in range(n): x = int(input()) if x != 0: heapq.heappush(h, x) elif h: res.append(heapq.heappop(h)) else: res.append(0) print(*res, sep='\n')

    February 6, 2021
    in Problem-solving

  • 백준 Silver4 - 나는야 포켓몬 마스터 이다솜

    백준 1620번 풀이 n, m = map(int, input().split()) pocket_num = {} num_pocket = {} for i in range(1, n+1): p = input() pocket_num[p] = i num_pocket[i] = p res = [] for _ in range(m): x = input() if x.isnumeric(): res.append(num_pocket[int(x)]) else: res.append(pocket_num[x]) print(*res, sep='\n')

    February 6, 2021
    in Problem-solving

    백준 14425번 풀이 n, m = map(int, input().split()) s = set() for _ in range(n): string = input() s.add(string) cnt = 0 for _ in range(m): string = input() if string in s: cnt += 1 print(cnt)
